roleset.name: to protect from impact
roleset.note: CUSHION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cushion' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cushion.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: cushion for
example.text: Denizens of London 's financial district are cushioning themselves for heavy blows .

example.name: cushion from
example.text: For instance , the new U.S. package makes clear [0] there would be a transition period during which [GATT members]-1 could use a combination of tariffs and quotas [*-1] to cushion their farmers from foreign competition [*T*-2] .

example.name: cushion against
example.text: But [its competitors -- including Dow Chemical Co. , Union Carbide Corp. and several oil giants --]-1 have much broader business interests and so are better cushioned [*-1]against price swings .
